briefTitle: Study to Test a Marketed Product in the Treatment of Migraine-associated Nausea
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Elimination of Migraine-Associated Nausea in Migraine Patients Treated With Rizatriptan Orally Disintegrating Tablet (ODT)
summary: Study to test the effectiveness of a marketed drug in the treatment of migraine-associated nausea.

primaryOutcome.measure: Participants With Elimination of Nausea at 2 Hours Postdose
